topic.title: Crisis Response Intermediate Care within 2 Hours Waiting Time Measurement
topic.shortdesc: A Crisis Response Intermediate Care Within 2 Hours Waiting Time Measurement is measured to ensure there are 120 minutes or less between the REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD START DATE and REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD START TIME and REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD END DATE and REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD END TIME.
